Package au.org.massive.oauth2_hpc

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationEntrypoint
    Main application entrypoint
    JsonRequest
    Utility class to process simple key/value json data in the request body.
    KeyAuthEndpoints
    Controller class for the key signing endpoint
    LdapUserDetailsService
    Queries an LDAP server for a uid based on a search filter
    OAuthResourceServer
    Configuration for the OAuth2 resource server
    OAuthServer
    OAuth2 authorisation server
    RegisteredClient
    Represents a client registered to authorise with the OAuth2 server
    SecurityConfiguration
    Service security configuration
    Settings
    Class that provides an abstraction from the configuration files, and sensible defaults if parameters are missing
    ShibbolethHeaderAuthenticationFilter
    Authentication filter to extract the user name (email) from HTTP headers
    UserDetailsImpl  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OAuthScopes
    Defines the scopes used in the OAuth2 auth flow
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExceededMaximumCertificateValidityException
    Exception thrown when the requested certificate duration exceedes the maximum allowed
